title: Citizen Conflict
description: Team-based hero shooter Citizen Conflict merges fast-paced gameplay with esports intensity for ultimate competitive action.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **What is Citizen Conflict?**
<!--text-->
Citizen Conflict is a free-to-play hero shooter that brings together the excitement of esports-style competition and the fast-paced action of Battle Royale games. It also has an engaging storyline, where three rival groups and unique heroes fight for control in a never-ending battle. Set in a futuristic dystopian world, the game will feature plenty of high-tech maps, weapons, and unusual gear to keep players hooked.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-cx5kx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-cx5kx.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Game Modes**
<!--text-->
**Takeover Mode: **A high-stakes, team-based mode where squads compete to control key locations on the map. Points are earned for assists, objectives and capturing control points. The first team to reach the target score claims victory, making teamwork, tactics, and hero synergy essential.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-166tn](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-166tn.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Esports-ready game maps**
<!--text-->
**District**

Citizens, gather your courage and explore this wild city designed for 5v5 mode. Every corner hides danger, and every alley could be a trap. Now in its new version, District is a place where only the toughest will survive. This District isn’t for the weak-hearted.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-oq0fa](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-oq0fa.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Depo 03**

A compact, fast-paced map designed for intense duels. Depo’s tight corridors and limited space make it ideal for quick, skill-based one-on-one matches where every move counts.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-1cgzl](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-1cgzl.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Pavilion**

A completely new, Asian-inspired arena that is both stunning and dangerous for personal duels. This small map is set in a tranquil, secluded area with minimal cover and few distractions, making it the perfect place to test your individual skills and reflexes.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-d055g](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-d055g.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Elite Enclave**

A luxurious, high-tech compound with open courtyards and futuristic architecture. You can choose to experience it in its original sleek form or opt for the Halloween edition, where eerie decorations and haunting effects change the atmosphere. Whether you're navigating the chaos of three teams or a classic 5v5 battle, this map demands sharp tactics and constant awareness of your surroundings.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-1yksk](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-1yksk.png)

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-z9x46](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-z9x46.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**New Pressburg**

Step into a futuristic take on Bratislava’s iconic castle, now a haunting Halloween battleground. Fight through eerie castle halls and a shadowed courtyard transformed for spine-chilling clashes.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-2zfrc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-2zfrc.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Playable Classes**
<!--text-->
Power up your team play with four classes, think over the strategy, and rule the pinnacle of the leaderboard. Choose one of three classes:
- Midnight
- Korpo
- Hackhunters

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-blqkr](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-blqkr.png)

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-1k6cd](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-1k6cd.png)

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-460pr](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-460pr.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Weapons**
<!--text-->
The endgame is to infest the Ether Islands with weapons above and beyond your imagination, from furious machine guns, heavy-hitting shotguns, cheeky pistols, and snipers to melee weapons.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-eit3p](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-eit3p.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Battle Pass
<!--text-->
The Season 1 Battle Pass enhances the gaming journey by providing players with additional rewards, such as exclusive cosmetics and in-game assets. To unlock these bonuses and progress through the tiers, players need to collect stars. Stars are earned by completing daily and weekly challenges.

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-wgi28](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-wgi28.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# LOOTBOXES
<!--text-->
A chest full of treasures that puts your luck to the test? All the way! Citizen Conflict keeps on bringing seasonal loot boxes tightly packed with various valuables and exclusive in-game content. So far, all the early Citizens had a chance to put their hands on Syndicate Box, Alpha 3.0 Box, Season 0 lootboxes, while now it’s your turn to craft gems locked inside the metal construction of Season 1 LootBox. 

- Exclusive “never be minted again” content
- Valuable NFTs to be used in-game

<!--image-->
![Citizen Conflict-amj3b](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e4536c88b07c4cd78219a66c8fa53815/citizen-conflict-amj3b.png)
